get.description: Checks if the current user has the required permission for the entity type.
Gets all effective permissions for the current user and the entity type.
Returns the OpenID Connect discovery document.
Shows the signin page for user selection.
Handles the user selection and generates authorization code.

post.description: Issues tokens for various grant types.

get.description: Returns information about the authenticated user.
Handles user logout.
Returns debug information about the identity provider configuration.

post.description: Grants a specific permission to a user for a specific entity.

delete.description: Revokes a specific permission from a user for a specific entity.

get.description: Retrieves all granted permissions for a user for a specific entity.

delete.description: Revokes all permissions from a user.

get.description: Retrieves all granted permissions for all users for a specific entity.

post.description: Grants a specific permission to a role for a specific entity.

delete.description: Revokes a specific permission from a role for a specific entity.

get.description: Retrieves all granted permissions for a role for a specific entity.

delete.description: Revokes all permissions from a role.

get.description: Retrieves all granted permissions for all roles for a specific entity.
Retrieves a list of all scheduled jobs.
Retrieves details for a specific job.
Retrieves execution history for a specific job with optional filters.

delete.description: Purges job run history older than a specified date.

get.description: Retrieves aggregated statistics for a jobâ€™s execution history.
Retrieves all triggers associated with a specific job.

post.description: Triggers a job to run immediately with optional data.
Pauses the execution of a specific job.
Resumes the execution of a paused job.
Interrupts the execution of a currently running job.

get.description: Retrieves a paged list of log entries with optional filters. Dates must be in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2025-04-15T00:00:00Z).

delete.description: Queues a maintenance operation for log entries older than a specified date or age, with options to archive, set batch size, and delay interval. Date must be in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2025-04-01T00:00:00Z).

get.description: Streams log entries in real-time based on optional filters. Dates must be in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2025-04-15T00:00:00Z).
Retrieves aggregated statistics for log entries, grouped by time intervals. Dates must be in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2025-04-15T00:00:00Z).
Exports log entries as a downloadable file in the specified format (csv, json, txt). Dates must be in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2025-04-15T00:00:00Z).
